r.s: Providing a somewhat unified API for handling
r.d: XML_Feed_Parser is a parser for RSS1, RSS2 and Atom format XML feeds. It attempts to provide a somewhat unified API while still allowing access to the full details of each feed type.
r.n: Fixed misplaced single quotes (bug #5677) Added samples of feeds in farsi and japanese, with test cases Reworked xml:base support - now applies to all appropriate atom text constructs Reworked atom text construct handling to obey 'type' attribute
